content.text: Agsilly is a New World pirate who allied himself with the Whitebeard Pirates.

Agsilly is a large man with tanned skin. He wears a black tricorne hat, with what seems to be a white bird on it. He also wears a grey coat, a light colored shirt, and pants that tuck into his tiny shoes.
In his original sketch, he wore similar clothes, but had a much rounder head, and forearms similar to Franky's. He also had a long thick beard in his original sketch as well as the anime.
He seems to be loyal to his alliance with the Whitebeard Pirates, as he was willing to fight in the war at Marineford in order to rescue Ace from execution.
He was seen fighting Marines, but his full power has not yet been shown.
He was present during the Whitebeard War at Marineford and, sometime in the past, allied himself with Whitebeard.
Somewhere in the New World on an unknown island, Agsilly is present along with the other pirates attending Whitebeard and Ace's funeral.

elements.text: ↑  One Piece Manga and Anime — Vol. 59 Chapter 578 and Episode 487, Agsilly makes his debut.
↑  One Piece Green: Secret Pieces, Agsilly's name is revealed.
↑  One Piece Manga and Anime — Vol. 59 Chapter 578 and Episode 487, Agsilly is present at the war.
↑  One Piece Manga and Anime — Vol. 60 Chapter 590 and Episode 505, Agsilly attends Whitebeard and Ace's funeral.
